aboutMe.headline: Mehr von mir
aboutMe.intro: Besides the usual "I like tech and am very ambitioned", I enjoy a few more things outside of the buble. Instead of writing long paragraphs of text, please check out the following:
blog.headline: Blog
blog.intro: A blog about things I want to write about. Probably food, garden, thoughts and the internet.

furtherQuestions.text: Do you have any questions, feedback or just want to talk?
